policies.involuntary_refund:
Involuntary Refund:
• If change is ≥3 hours and passenger declines → full refund allowed.
• Cancel all segments in the PNR first.
• Use ENDO BOX format: INV REF NO [Flight#/Date-CXL].
policies.involuntary_reissue:
Involuntary Reissue (Schedule Change):
• If pax accepts new flight → reissue with ENDO BOX: INVOL SKCHG.
• If pax rejects → rebook closest available flight in same RBD.
• If same class unavailable → contact neosair@apg-ga.us.
• No waiver required.

Voluntary changes follow fare rules. Penalties and fare differences may apply based on fare basis.
policies.voluntary_refund:
:
• Follow fare rules per GDS entry. Refunds subject to cancellation penalties and service fees.
• 24-hour cancellation policy applies for tickets booked at least 7 days before departure.
• Refunds on lost tickets require identity verification and processing conditions.
• Refunds refused after 30 days from ticket validity expiration.
policies.medical_refund:
• No standard waiver codes published.
• Use ENDO BOX to indicate authorization for involuntary cases (e.g., INV REF NO703).
• For void exceptions or name corrections, internal waiver email must be sent to Neos HQ with CC to APG Inside Sales. 
• Waiver tracking required via internal Excel log.
policies.name_change:
If RBD is same and correction ≤3 characters:
• Refund incorrect ticket.
• Reissue with corrected name and same RBD.
• Use waiver code in ENDO.
• Report to Simona.LoVecchio@neosair.it and CC distribution@neosair.it + APG Inside Sales.

If correction >3 characters or RBD not available:
• Email tickets@neosair.it with:
  • Passport
  • Neos PNR
  • Incorrect & corrected names
• HQ will review and take over from this point forward.
policies.group_booking:
• Group booking policies not publicly disclosed.
• All B2B group requests must go through official Neos or APG channels.
• Name corrections in group bookings follow same 3-character rule with waiver route.
• Infants allowed after 1 week of age; standard group infant discount rules apply.
policies.infant_policy:
• Infants must be at least 7 days old to fly.
• Seated on adult’s lap unless child fare seat purchased with approved car seat.
• Infant baggage allowance and additional services subject to route and fare type.
• Standard discount (~90%) applied for lap infants.
• Infants turning 2 during trip must be rebooked as child with appropriate fare throughout.
policies.baggage_policy:
• Baggage rules defined per route and fare basis.
• Free baggage allowance printed on ticket or itinerary receipt.
• Carry-on: Must fit under seat or overhead bin (size and weight limits apply).
• Checked baggage over allowance incurs excess charges.
• Musical instruments, sports gear, and high-value items may require special declaration and fees.
• Compensation capped at 1,519 SDR for damage or loss (per Montreal Convention).
policies.seat_request_policy:
• Seat selection policies not explicitly stated in Conditions.
• Standard rules imply:
  • Advance selection may be available based on fare.
  • Special seats (e.g., exit rows) subject to eligibility (age, physical ability, etc.).
  • Passengers moved for operational reasons may request refund of paid seats.
• Specific requests should be made during booking or check-in window.
policies.short_term_cancellation_policy:
If GDS void fails within 24 hours:
• Ensure all conditions met:
  • USA-issued ticket
  • Amadeus or Sabre
  • Within 24h window
• Agent should:
  • Cancel all segments
  • Refund with waiver code in ENDO (e.g., NO703204)
  • Open IR in Amadeus
  • Email case to: distribution@neosair.it
  • CC: filippo.casali@neosair.it
• Use subject: 'Unable to void within 24 hours – Neos PNR…'
• Log all exceptions in waiver Excel.
• Fri–Sun exceptions: Monday voids may apply.
